metadata.title: CVE-2022-3450 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Peer Connection in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.119allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
